
Ethernet Header
	|-Source Address	: 00-00-00-00-00-00
	|-Destination Address	: 00-00-00-00-00-00
	|-Protocol		: 8

IP Header
	|-Version              : 4
	|-Internet Header Len : 5 DWORDS or 20 Bytes
	|-Type Of Service     : 0
	|-Total Length        : 60  Bytes
	|-Identification      : 37522
	|-Time To Live	      : 64
	|-Protocol 	          : 17
	|-Header Checksum     : 43548
	|-Source IP           : 127.0.0.1
	|-Destination IP      : 127.0.0.1

UDP Header
	|-Source Port    	: 45930
	|-Destination Port	: 4791
	|-UDP Length      	: 40
	|-UDP Checksum   	: 65083
*****************************************************************



*************************Infiniband packet*******************
 Infiniband base transport header
	|-Opcode            : 4
	|-tver          	: 0
	|-Partition Key    	: 65535
	|-Destination Qp    : 11
	|-Acknowledge Req   : 80
	|-Packet Seq Nr   	: 0
*****************************************************************



*************************Infiniband packet*******************
 ib_rc_send_only
	|-Lenght                   : 59
*****************************************************************



Data rc_send_only, with size of 59 bytes

 0000 : 00  FF  FF  00  00  00  11  80  A5  98  09  00  00  56  40  02 
 0010 : 37

	|-Destination Address	: 00-00-00-00-00-00

	|-Protocol 	          : 17
	|-Header Checksum     : 43548

	|-Destination IP      : 127.0.0.1
